title: Adobe After Effects CC 2015 (v13.5) RUS-ENG {by M0nkrus}-=TEAM O

assembly Author : m0nkrus
Language: English / Russian
Treatment: complete
Type of medicine: keygen + patch

System requirements:
- Processor Intel Core 2 Duo or AMD Phenom II with support for 64-bit operating systems
- Microsoft Windows 7 SP1 x64, Windows 8 / 8.1 x64
- 4 GB of RAM (8 GB recommended)
- 5 GB of free hard disk space; during installation you need additional space (the product can not be installed on a removable flash memory device)
- Additional disk space for disk cache (10 GB recommended)
- Display with a resolution of 1280 x 1080
- System with support for OpenGL 2.0
- for QuickTime features necessary QuickTime 7.6.6 software
- Optional: Certified by Adobe graphics adapter hardware acceleration for three-dimensional visualization using ray tracing
- to access a Web service requires access to the Internet and registration

Description: Adobe After Effects CC 2015
- a popular program for video editing and dynamic image creating tracks, special effects and animation. Most often it is used to process video (post-production),
the creation of music videos, commercials, animations, titles, and many other elements that require digital video effects. Adobe After Effects CC 2015 offers excellent management,
a wide range of creative tools, as well as the ability to integrate with other applications for processing video data. With an extensive library of plug-ins developed by third parties,
Adobe After Effects CC 2015 is also used in the printing and graphic design for editing static graphic images (photos, images created on the computer, and so forth.).

List of changes

- The distribution integrated update to Adobe Camera Raw to version 9.1.60.
- The distribution is integrated with the utility Adobe Update Managment Tool 8.0 (developed PAINTER ), which allows you to set the "cloud" update.
- In the folder Crack in the image are a set of tools and detailed instructions to register the Adobe After Effects CC 2015.
